DOC.brief_summary: The present study aim assess prevalence impact comorbid psychiatric disorder among patient chronic obstructive pulmonary disease ( COPD ) undergo pulmonary rehabilitation ( PR ) , order determine effect psychiatric comorbidity exercise tolerance physical activity post-PR HRQoL , well determine process psychiatric disorder may impact patient behaviour .
DOC.brief_title: Predictors Long-term Functional Benefits Pulmonary Rehabilitation Program ?
DOC.criteria: 1 . Patients age 40 eligible 2. diagnose moderatesevere COPD , 3. refer PR program , ( 4 ) agree participate . They exclude : 1. comorbidity important ( i.e. , likely cause morbidity mortality ) COPD ( e.g. , active cancer ) , 2. contraindication exercise ( though likely refer PR ) , 3. participate PR program past year , 4. unable provide inform consent due language difficulty cognitive impairment .
